title: As a club, I want player IDs that have been changed or been created for a given date range
custom_expected:
'**AC**
- Tester can input a date range  
- Response returns with player IDs where for that player, a field in the player profile (excluding service fields) has been changed within the date range
- If a profile has become a pro player profile within the date range, then include in the list
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information
- Only return player IDs for Pro player profiles
- If date range is invalid, return an error response code

Questions
- Are change stamps at the field level? If not, how do we tell which players change?

title: As a tester, I want to access the MNC API responses
custom_expected:
'**AC**
- Testers have a basic UI to select the API, and to supply input parameters
- They should also see the returned API response in a readable JSON format (with indents)
- The UI will have a basic Expand and collapse feature
- The UI should allow the tester to login with an API credential

title: As a club, I want all MNC Contract Ids returned for a given Player ID
custom_expected:
'**Rules**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Minor+League+Contracts

**AC**
- Club users can only retrieve MN contract info for contracts that are in one of the following states:
-- Approved
-- Expired
-- Voided
-- Terminated
- For a given Player ID, all MNC contract IDs should be returned along with MJC Ids 
- User can set a parameter to show MNC or MJC Contract Ids only
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI for the Contract.
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

title: As a club, I want all MNC Contract Ids updated within a given date range
custom_expected:
'**Rules**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Minor+League+Contracts

**AC**
- Club users can only retrieve MN contract info for contracts that are in one of the following states:
-- Approved
-- Expired
-- Voided
-- Terminated
- For a date and time range, all MNC contract IDs that have had any field updated should be returned along with MJC Ids
- Large responses should be limited with an offset as set in the EbisLink wiki guidelines 
- User can set a parameter to show MNC or MJC Contract Ids only
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI for the Contract.
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

title: Un-stage mnc's after bulletin is created.
custom_expected: Staged mnc's should be made available to clubs after the transaction bulletin is created.

title: As a club, I want Addendum A fields returned for a specific Contract ID
custom_expected:
'**Rules**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Minor+League+Contracts

**AC**
- Club users can only retrieve MN contract info for contracts that are in one of the following states:
-- Approved
-- Expired
-- Voided
-- Terminated
- Club user must be able to retrieve all fields listed under the "Addendum A" Section on the wiki 
- Any fields listed as "DO NOT INCLUDE" on the wiki should not be included
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI for the Contract.
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

title: As a club, I want all Addendum Cs updated within a given date range
custom_expected:
'**Rules**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Addendum+C

- Club users can only retrieve Add C info for Addendum Cs that are in one of the following states:
-- Approved
-- Rejected Accepted
-- Voided
-- Pending Approval (except NOTE THAT Pending Approval Addendum Cs are only visible to Club users if the Addendum C Org is the same as the Club user's Org; otherwise, the Addendum C should not be returned to the Club user at all)
-- Rejected
- For a date and time range, all Add C IDs that have had any field updated should be returned (see exception above regarding Pending Approval Addendum Cs)
- Large responses should be limited with an offset as set in the EbisLink wiki guidelines 
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI for the Addendum.
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

title: As a club, I want updates to an Add C's service flag to be reflected via the API
custom_expected:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Valid for service flag" on Add C's can be updated by transactions (voiding the Add C for purposes of free agency) and batches. Updates to this flag should be reflected in couchbase, and therefore available to the Clubs via the API. 
* An example of a transaction that changes this flag is a Restricted List placement. - see IL Rules for specifics: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/13.+Place+on+Restricted+List

title: Unstaging of Addendum C's
custom_expected:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Add C's that are included in the MNC should be staged. 
* These should be unstaged with the sending of the Tx Bulletin. 
* Add C's that are not included in the MNC should not be staged.
